title: Travel sleeping pillow

claims.preamble: The ornamental design for a travel sleeping pillow, as shown and described.

description: FIG. 1 is a top perspective view of a travel sleeping pillow showing my new design.
FIG. 2 is a top plan view thereof.
FIG. 3 is a bottom plan view thereof.
FIG. 4 is a front view thereof.
FIG. 5 is a rear view thereof.
FIG. 6 is a left side view thereof; and,
FIG. 7 is a right side view thereof.
In the drawings, the broken lines represent environmental structure forming no part of the claim.
